about_the_game:
Star Mercenary is a third-person top-down shooting game. In the game, you need to play the leader of an interstellar mercenary organization and find planets in need of help among the billions of planetary systems in the Milky Way. Accept their commission and then. Help them destroy all kinds of enemies on the planet.

In the game, you can use guns, rockets, mines, grenades, drones, robots and other props to destroy the enemy, and you must always pay attention to controlling your fire output to avoid running out of ammunition before the supply arrives.

After destroying the enemies, you can obtain relevant rewards to upgrade the character or sell it to merchants to earn rewards. You can also use game props to unlock different characters.

Hurry up and board your spaceship and start the adventure!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains shooting and bloodshed

short_description: This is a 3D top-down shooting game with a huge open universe. You can drive a spaceship to find planets in need of help throughout the galaxy, help them destroy enemies, and earn your commission. Recruit team members, upgrade combat skills, and develop into a powerful interstellar mercenary group.
